name: Pocket Coin Stack
description:
Have fun paying for useless things! Like a wooden bucket. Does it help you in anyway? No. Is it fun? Heck YEAH. Just try this game and convince yourself. It's oddly satisfying.

Pocket Coin Stack Features:

• Leaderboard - challenge your friends!
• Ridiculously easy to learn! Just tap the screen to launch coins.
• Well balanced (not too easy, not too hard).
• Share your score with friends and challenge them!
• Free iMessage Sticker pack included .
• Haptic Feedback.
• Exciting game modes waiting to be unlocked by you.
• Beautiful graphics, animations and colour palette.
• Isometric artwork everywhere!
• Optimised for iPhone X, XS and XR
